description: Antonio was visiting some family down in Florida over the Summer. He'd worked on his tan at the beach and met a few sexy surfer guys. One named James had become especially friendly. Antonio had been with girls before, but never guys. All of a sudden though, he found himself very attracted to James. He had a surfer crush and wanted to explore it some more. You won't to miss his first experience. It was HOT!
title: Surfer Crush
